item.title: These Infinitely Recyclable Clothes Are Made From Ocean Trash And Other Plastic Waste
item.description:
These Infinitely Recyclable Clothes Are Made From Ocean Trash And Other Plastic Waste

If Outerknown's new board shorts ever tear after riding too many waves, you could theoretically recycle them into a new pair. They're from a new line of men's clothing that is made entirely from plastic trash. When the clothes wear out, they can be fully upcycled into a brand-new shirt or jacket.

item.title: Circuit Board Ties and Tech Fashion Revolution! | TechWears
item.description:
Circuit Board Ties and Tech Fashion Revolution! | TechWears

Drew Johnson is raising funds for Circuit Board Ties and Tech Fashion Revolution! | TechWears on Kickstarter! Black tie events will never be the same. Geek out on the world's first Circuit Board Tie, delivered by Christmas!

item.title: Nautical Rope Bracelets | Recycled Jewelry | Marine Debris Awareness
item.description:
Nautical Rope Bracelets | Recycled Jewelry | Marine Debris Awareness

Marine debris awareness bracelets. Planet Love Life bracelets are made out of recycled nautical rope collected on beach cleanup projects. Help clean the planet!
